column2: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a] | keeps elements that satisfy predicate
[a] -> Int -> a | element at index (0-based, partial)
[a] -> [b] -> [(a,b)] | pairs elements until shortest list ends
(a -> b) -> a -> b | low precedence function application
(b -> c) -> (a -> b) -> a -> c | function composition (g then f)
(a -> b -> c) -> b -> a -> c | swaps first two arguments
(a -> b) -> [a] -> [b] | applies function to each element
(a -> b -> b) -> b -> [a] -> b | right associative fold
(b -> a -> b) -> b -> [a] -> b | left associative fold
(a -> a -> a) -> [a] -> a | foldr without start value (non-empty)
(a -> a -> a) -> [a] -> a | foldl without start value (non-empty)
FilePath -> IO String | reads file contents
a -> m a | lifts pure value into monad
